
```{r bishop_unnecessary_admissions_matched, echo = FALSE, cache = FALSE, results = 'hide', eval = TRUE}

                                                theme         = theme_bw(),
                                                latex         = FALSE,

```
